Description:
Brand New & Ready For You in Officer!
Bright and sunny in one of the best locations in Officer, this immaculately presented 3-bedroom home is a modern Officer delight!
Sitting just moments away from Officer and quality schooling, this is a perfect freestanding home for young families, downsizers or investors alike.
Stepping through the charming entry follow the stylish laminated flooring through to the open plan kitchen/meals/lounge areas. The spacious and well-appointed stone kitchen has ample cabinetry, modern stainless appliances, and bench space.
Additional features of this generous layout include gas ducted heating, single remote garage with internal access.
There are built-in wardrobes to two bedrooms, which are serviced by a central bathroom. The master bedroom has built in robe and a chic stone ensuite.
This secure 221m2 block has enough room for pets/children and includes merbau decking and artificial grass offering a low maintenance solution.
Close to shops, schools, Parks and Transport. Do not delay call to book a private inspection or attend one of our regular open for inspections.
Real estate Officer, Barry & Christine Eview Group, Officer real estate, real estate agents Officer.

Description:
PRIZED LOCATION
Proudly situated high on the hills of the most prestigious estate in Officer, the Timbertop Estate.
This beautifully positioned allotment of approximately 667 sqm is fully fenced with retaining wall boundaries already in place, views and ready to be the site of your dream home. Surrounded by high calibre homes in a neighbourhood of obvious affluence, your family will thrive in this friendly community.
Officer is quickly becoming the go to suburb of the outer south eastern corridor with an array of existing, current and future amenities such as
Cardinia Shire Civic Centre
Supermarkets & Specialty Stores
Restaurants & Cafes
Cinema Complex
and many more local attributes.
With an easy commute of approx. 19mins to the major shopping precinct of the Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and the MI Freeway which for those of you who travel to the CBD is approx. 45 mins by car.
If you can see your family becoming part of this highly sought after community call today for further details.

Description:
Grandvue's Finest!
Set in Officers sought after Grandvue Estate sits this near new Hotondo build looking for its new owners!
Comprising four generous sized bedrooms, including master suite with boutique ensuite complimented by stone benches, double vanities and walk in robe.
The three remaining bedrooms are located to rear of the home all with built in robes, are serviced by the main bathroom.
The kitchen is the heart of the home with waterfall Caesar stone benches, bespoke pendant lights, quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and plenty of cupboard and bench space even the most fastidious of buyer will be impressed!
Needing space? With two separate living zones every member of the family has their own area to enjoy!
Outside the entertaining area is a showcase piece, with ceiling fan and bench seats this perfectly kept, and recently re-oiled deck is ready for all this years summer BBQs! The deck also leads out to a low maintenance landscaped backyard perfect for kids and pets.
Immaculately presented with all the modern conveniences such as floating floor boards, integrated speakers both inside and out, split system cooling, ducted heating, ceiling fans, double remote garage, with rear access and security cameras all located close to schools, shops, public transport and M1 access there has been no box left unticked! All this situated on a 440sqm approx. block overlooking serene pasture and walking tracks! Call today to inspect!

Elevated 552sqm Titled Block at Timbertop
* SOLD : Call Vincent Lim 0437 008 418 for similar land to purchase or to sell.
This premium lot located within walking distance to Hicks Reserve Playground and surrounded by premium homes with parklands and schools nearby. The block has no easement with 16m frontage and 34.5m depth which is perfect for your dream home design. There's additional parking space at the front of the lot.
Convenience situated approximately 5 minutes drive to Haileybury College in Berwick, and just a few minutes drive to Officer and Beaconsfield shopping centre.
To appreciate this great opportunity, contact Vincent Lim 0437 008 418 today before it goes under contract.

Description:
The Appeal Of Position & The Allure Of Luxury
The appeal of position and the allure of luxury, a family home like no other in the popular Timbertop Estate. Offering a flexible floorplan displaying a master suite both upstairs and downstairs, ideal for the growing family and offering a collection of 5 bedrooms throughout the home. Spacious sun filled living areas will continue to keep the whole family entertained with my most favourite room a designated theatre room equipped with surround sound projector and large screen, the perfect place to rest & relax on a cold winters evening. The stunning white kitchen is lined in stone surfaces with striking big windows gazing to the landscaped gardens and spilling out to alfresco area. The kitchen is fitted with double drawer dishwasher, butlers pantry & dry pantry, 900mm stove top & oven, self-closing drawers & cupboards. Outside the home, summer days will be spent around the solar heated pool and entertaining friends, for all year-round enjoyment the outdoor area is fitted with remote blinds and electric heaters. Additional features of the home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gas log fireplace, downstairs powder room, internal access from garage, built in bar with wine fridge and surround sound to family room. This amazing package is an outstanding opportunity in the much-loved Timbertop community, everything you may want in a home is available right here, inspect with confidence and your dreams will become your reality.

Description:
Immaculate Family Entertainer
A perfect blend of modern and contemporary styling, this home is a stunning example of a family residence with design principles, commitment to quality and a passion for entertaining. Striking flooring flows throughout the home naturally complimented with an abundance of sunlight. Through to an extensive family lifestyle domain incorporating a state-of-the-art kitchen equipped with integrated feature stone benchtops, a full suite of prestige appliances, a butler's pantry and all overlooking the family/meals and dining area. Sliding stacker doors open to the outdoor entertaining - perfect for indoor-outdoor dining and relaxation. Versatile accommodation of generous proportions, an additional separate living room which offers room for expanding families to enjoy their own pursuits.
Accommodation for all with four large bedrooms, impressive master suite with walk in robe and double vanity ensuite, spacious three remaining rooms with walk in robes serviced by the central main bathroom. Additional great sized grassed area and the concreted off-street parking space with double gated access is perfect for a trailer, caravan or boat in addition to the double garage with internal access.
Other comprehensive features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, comprehensive home automation system, spacious laundry and gas log fireplace.
Located within walking distance to local parks, within proximity of highly sought-after schools both public and private, easy access to the freeway and close to public transport.
This stunning creation leaves nothing to be desired.

Description:
Fresh and Inviting
You will be hard pressed to find another low maintenance property presented like this. Currently tenanted until August at $1,603pcm, well cared for and maintained since its construction approximately 4 years ago, this 3 bedroom home is ready and waiting for you.
The master bedroom comes complete with full ensuite & walk in robe while the remaining 2 bedrooms are equipped with double built in robes.
With an abundance of natural light throughout the home, the family/lounge room adjoins the meals area and a kitchen, with loads of cupboard space, modern 900mm appliances and stone benchtops.
Also offering ducted heating throughout, split system cooling, rear outdoor entertaining area, fully enclosed low maintenance yard and double remote garage.
Within easy distance to local primary and secondary schools, shops and transport 13 Papa Way, Officer will appeal to first home buyers, downsizing retirees or astute investors.

Description:
OFFERS CLOSING SATURDAY 6TH JUNE AT 5PM
Surrounded amongst house proud homes is where you will find this stunning family home, a short stroll from Arena Shopping Centre and sitting on a generous 576sqm parcel of land. As you enter the home you are welcomed with warm, inviting floorboards that flow throughout and the high ceilings that are a feature of the home. The formal lounge greets you on your left, and the master bedroom is conveniently located at the front of the home, with his and hers walk in robes and full ensuite with stone benchtops and separate toilet. Moving through to the heart of the home you will find the light and bright open plan living and dining area, which is overlooked by the stunning Chefs kitchen with massive island benchtop, 700mm appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry. The three further bedrooms are all very generous in size with built in robes and are located off the hallway where you will find the central bathroom with stone benchtops, bath and separate shower. Stepping outside onto the large undercover alfresco, you are welcomed with low maintenance gardens and the beautiful pool area where many Summers are to be enjoyed with friends and family. A house of this quality speaks for itself and comes complete with ducted heating, four split systems air conditioners, electric roller shutters and alarm system. With Arena shopping centre just around the corner, and Officer quickly becoming known for its abundance of quality schooling this home is sure to be in high demand.
Insights: 4 Still Water Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
A MUST SELL IN ARENA!
Perfectly positioned in the prestige and established Arena Estate we present for sale this immaculate quality-built home that must be sold.
This impeccable four-bedroom home features a practical floorplan with the master bedroom situated at the entrance of the home with a full ensuite and walk in robe, the additional bedrooms towards the back of the home fitted with built in robes and serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Offering an open plan and modern design with two living areas create ideal zones for the family to enjoy. Superb kitchen with quality finishes featuring stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, oven & rangehood, ample bench space and cupboard storage.
Impressive extras: remote control double garage with internal and rear access, low maintenance back yard, undercover pergola, split system air conditioner and ducted heating.
Situated walking distance from everything you would possibly need from the local supermarket, medical centre, Kindergarten, St Francis Xavier School, St Clares Primary school and only minutes' drive to the Princes Hwy, M1 Freeway, Cardinia Train Station and public transport.
This family home must be sold! Do not miss out on this opportunity and contact Susan 0448 101 746 to book an inspection today.

Description:
Grand Living in Grandvue
This stylish ex-display home is perfectly positioned in the ever-popular Grandvue Estate and has been built to the highest standards. A stunning façade with beautifully landscaped gardens are the perfect start to this surprising home. At the front of the home is the large master suite featuring large walk in robe, stunning hotel inspired ensuite with double vanities and double shower. There are a total of 3 separate living zones which include a rumpus room, kids retreat area and a large family meals area overlooking a beautiful central kitchen with cascading Caesarstone benches and a butlers pantry with further sink and dishwasher. Three further generous bedrooms with built in robes and a separate open study. Entertaining is effortless flowing from the inside to the outside with a decked alfresco area, a place to relax on weekends and still plenty of room for the kids to play in the secure backyard. There is an extensive list of extras included such as ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling, alarm system and cameras, ducted vacuum, quality curtains, double remote-controlled garage with internal access.
Insights: 35 Grandvue Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Titled and ready!

Description:
King of the Hill
With sweeping views over Hicks Reserve in Timbertop is this one of best TITLED allotments in Officer.
Site costs will be minimal on this near level allotment. A wide frontage of 15m and an area of 420sqm this premium allotment will suit a variety of home designs that will capture views to all the way to Westernport Bay.
With the second stage of Timbertop Blvd now open this fantastic opportunity is within easy access private schools, walking trails and DAngelos Winery!
Insights: 16 Ridgewell Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020.
